main event: A civilian reported seeing a bright, disc-shaped object in Dayton, Ohio, on March 6, 1965.
interesting points: The object was first observed out of the corner of the eye moving toward Wright-Patterson AFB.,It appeared silver and had a pulsing light.,The sighting lasted about 15 minutes before the object disappeared.,The case was concluded as an unidentified aircraft, likely a military craft., There were no photographs or physical evidence of the sighting.
sighted object: one disc-shaped object with a pulsing light
witness description: A civilian observer who reported the event.
